p: Petals of Rosa x damascena Herrm. (rose petals) originated from Agios Georgios Sikousis, Chios island (Northern Aegean, Greece) and were collected in May–June 2019, while Pelargonium graveolens (Thunb.) L’Hèr (rose geranium) was collected from a cultivation from the area of Patras (Achaia, Peloponnese, Greece) in May–June 2019.
